Pre-Game Insights: The match is crucial for both teams as India aims to secure their semi-final spot, while Australia looks to prevent India from doing so.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The article mentions the historical performance of India against Australia in T20I matches, with India having a better overall record.
Others: The match will be played at the Daren Sammy National Cricket Stadium in Gros Islet, Saint Lucia, on June 24, 2024.
